title: Folkestone Eurotunnel
address: Terminal, 8XX, Ashford Rd, Folkestone, United Kingdom
review:
The Passport check by Border Force was good.
The passport check by french border force was a joke. Officer was more interested in his non work discussion with a coworker than checking passports or waving us through. Had to wait and get his attention. Could have entered France with a sheet of toilet paper.

Eurotunnel staff was friendly. Travel was swift and convenient.
